alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 01 at 6:50PM CST until February 04 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 PM CST Wednesday was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.8 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 16.5 Wed 6 pm CST 16.4 16.8 15.9 &&
